name: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for changing a vehicle’s climate control settings.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveEnableFan(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can enable the car’s fan.

items.name: func resolveEnableAirConditioner(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can enable the air conditioner.

items.name: func resolveEnableClimateControl(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can enable the climate control system.

items.name: func resolveEnableAutoMode(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can enable automatic mode for the car’s climate control.

items.name: func resolveAirCirculationMode(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INCarAirCirculationModeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the requested air circulation mode.

items.name: func resolveFanSpeedIndex(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INIntegerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the requested fan speed index.

items.name: func resolveFanSpeedPercentage(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INDoubleResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the requested fan speed percentage.

items.name: func resolveRelativeFanSpeedSetting(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INRelativeSettingResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the requested relative qualifier for the fan speed.

items.name: func resolveRelativeTemperatureSetting(for: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INRelativeSettingResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the requested relative qualifier for the temperature change.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, completion: (INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can change the climate settings.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent, completion: (INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles changing the climate control settings.
